nodes.text: The Ando Prime Centrum was a podracing course located on the icy planet of Ando Prime. The Grand Trophy originated from a race on the course and,  by 32 BBY, had found its way into the Toydarian junk dealer Watto's junkshop on the planet Tatooine.

The Ando Prime Centrum was mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2016 reference book, Star Wars: Complete Locations, in a portion focusing on locations from the 1999 prequel trilogy film Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace, which was originally written by Kristin Lund for her Star Wars Legends reference book released in 2000, Inside the Worlds of Star Wars: Episode I. The Ando Prime Centrum was first introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity via Star Wars Episode I: Racer, a 1999 LucasArts video game.
